T02D2497:260a-1: tstsha tr'a di pra tishth'a dz'irnno dh'a ra bi dhi: bod skad du /
T02D2497:260a-2: gdugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga /
T02D2497:260a-3: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2497:260a-4: de nas gser las grub pa la sogs pa'i gdugs
T02D2497:260a-5: aa yig las skyes pa'i yu ba aa ba dh'u
T02D2497:260a-7: ham yig las skyes pa rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2497:260a-8: kyis nges par bcings pa'i rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2497:260a-9: pa / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi chos kyi dbyings mtshon par byed cing /
T02D2497:260a-10: nyon mongs pa'i tsha gdung thams cad 'phrog par byed pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2497:260a-11: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi
T02D2497:260a-12: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste
T02D2497:260a-13: der gzhug par bya zhing bum pa'i chus dbang bskur
T02D2497:260a-14: te yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2497:260a-15: aom na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am a'a:tstsha tr'a ba li sv'a h'a /
T02D2497:260a-16: 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags par bya ste gdugs rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2497:260a-17: de bzhin du aom yig las skyes pa ches bzang
T02D2497:260a-18: po'i gser gyis spras pa'i yu ba can bkra shis
T02D2497:260a-19: pa'i rang bzhin ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar
T02D2497:260a-20: ba'i rnga yab rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2497:260a-21: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi
T02D2497:260a-22: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste
T02D2497:260a-23: dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing /
T02D2497:260a-24: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2497:260a-25: aom tsu ru ts'a ma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D2497:260a-26: zhes pa'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du lhag
T02D2497:260a-27: par gnas par bya ste rnga yab rab tu gnas
T02D2497:260a-28: pa'o // de bzhin du sim yig las skyes pa'i seng ge dang /
T02D2497:260b-0: aa yig @260b las skyes pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02D2497:260b-1: kam yig las skyes pa'i rin po che'i bum pa dang /
T02D2497:260b-2: ma yig las skyes pa'i nya dang rma bya dang ri dags dang chu srin la sogs pa dang /
T02D2497:260b-3: gam yig las skyes pa'i mkha' lding dang /
T02D2497:260b-4: pam yig las skyes pa'i padma dang /
T02D2497:260b-5: aa yig las skyes pa'i me long dang /
T02D2497:260b-6: aam yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D2497:260b-8: h'um yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2497:260b-9: tram yig las skyes pa'i rin po che dang /
T02D2497:260b-10: ham yig las skyes pa'i dang pa la sogs pas
T02D2497:260b-11: mtshan par gyur pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par
T02D2497:260b-12: bsams nas de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2497:260b-13: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D2497:260b-14: bkug ste dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya
T02D2497:260b-15: zhing / bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2497:260b-16: aom a'a:badzra dh'a dza ba ti dza yotta ri sv'a h'a /
T02D2497:260b-17: zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du lhag par
T02D2497:260b-18: gnas par bya ste rgyal mtshan rab tu gnas pa'o
T02D2497:260b-19: // de bzhin du pam yig las skyes pa 'od
T02D2497:260b-20: gsal zhing rab tu gdung ba skyed par byed pa'i
T02D2497:260b-21: dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2497:260b-22: de dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi
T02D2497:260b-23: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug ste
T02D2497:260b-24: dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing /
T02D2497:260b-25: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2497:260b-26: aom a'a:badzra ke tu badzra pa t'a ke dhi tishtha pam sv'a h'a /
T02D2497:260b-27: zhes pa 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya ste ba dan rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2497:260b-28: de nas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha dang gnas kyi bdag
T02D2497:260b-29: po dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang sa'i bdag po
T02D2497:260b-30: dang glags lta ba'i skye bo dang bzo bo dang
T02D2497:260b-31: slob dpon dang chos smra ba la sogs pa rnams
T02D2497:260b-32: la bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin mchod pa byas
T02D2497:260b-33: nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma chen po
T02D2497:260b-34: sbyin par bya'o // grong dang grong khyer dang gtsug
T02D2497:260b-35: lag khang la sogs pa gang du mchod rten dang
T02D2497:260b-36: sbyin par bya'o // / sku gzugs dang /
T02D2497:260b-37: rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnying pa dang gas pa
T02D2497:260b-38: dang tshig pa dang zhig pa la sogs par lha
T02D2497:261a-0: rnams gnas bar gyur na gnas der sems @261a *
T02D2497:261a-1: // can rnams la nor nyams pa dang 'thab rtsod
T02D2497:261a-2: dang mu ge dang skye bo rnams zad par 'gyur
T02D2497:261a-3: ba la sogs pa'i skyon rnams 'byung bas rnying pa
T02D2497:261a-5: de la slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal
T02D2497:261a-6: 'byor dang ldan pa sa chu dang me tog dang
T02D2497:261a-7: bdug pa dang mar me dang zhal zas la sogs
T02D2497:261a-8: pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2497:261a-10: bcom ldan che ge rdo rje mchog / rig sngags rgyal po khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2497:261a-11: sems can rnams la phan phyir dang //
T02D2497:261a-12: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2497:261a-13: mgon po rnying pa 'byin pa yi //
T02D2497:261a-14: cho ga bzang po bya par 'dod //
T02D2497:261a-15: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D2497:261a-16: bum pa 'dir ni gzhug par gsol //
T02D2497:261a-18: de nas yud tsam de la nges par brtags te
T02D2497:261a-19: de'i thugs kar de'i sa bon bltas te lag pa
T02D2497:261a-20: g-yon pas bgrang phreng bzung nas /
T02D2497:261a-21: de la bcings pa'i srad bu lnga dang rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa g-yas pas bzung ste /
T02D2497:261a-22: rang rang gi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs
T02D2497:261a-23: su bzla zhing ho: yig gnyis dang spel ba'i sa
T02D2497:261a-24: bon rnam par gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2497:261a-25: de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg byas
T02D2497:261a-26: nas thag pa rnams kyis bcings te khyu mchog gi
T02D2497:261a-27: 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa rnams kyis bskyod par bya'o
T02D2497:261a-28: // de nas bum pa de sa phyogs dben par
T02D2497:261a-29: bzhag ste me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang
T02D2497:261a-31: mchod rten la sogs pa rdo'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /
T02D2497:261a-32: grub pa dang zhig pa de ni chu mang po yod pa'i chu klung du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2497:261a-33: sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la sogs pa gang
T02D2497:261a-34: dang gang 'du bya bar mi bzod par rnams ni
T02D2497:261a-35: de nyid du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2497:261a-36: gang dang gang shing las byas pa'i rnying pa dang
T02D2497:261a-37: zhig pa de dang de ni mar gyis bsgos te
T02D2497:261a-38: ras kyis dkris nas sbyin sreg gi mes bsreg par
T02D2497:261a-39: bya'o // gang zhig zangs la sogs pa las byas
T02D2497:261a-40: pa de ni bzhu nas sngar gyi tshad las mi
T02D2497:261a-41: bya'o // dman par bya'o // mchod rten la sogs
T02D2497:261a-42: pa de dag grub nas mchod yon la sogs pa'i
T02D2497:261a-43: mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas sngar bum par bzhag
T02D2497:261a-44: pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi ye
T02D2497:261b-0: @261b shes sems dpa' phyung nas mchod rten la sogs
T02D2497:261b-1: pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug par bya zhing
T02D2497:261b-2: de la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02D2497:261b-3: de nas rang rang gi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2497:261b-4: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas me'i mchod pa dang rab tu gnas pa yang bya'o //
T02D2497:261b-6: gdugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang rnying
T02D2497:261b-7: pa 'byin pa'i cho ga 'di'i rgya dpe gnyal gyi
T02D2497:261b-9: bstan pa rin po che la phul du byung ba'i
T02D2497:261b-10: gces spras su mdzad pa mtshungs med chos kyi rje
T02D2497:261b-11: rin po che zhva dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi
T02D2497:261b-12: pa'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces bka' stsal pa
T02D2497:261b-13: bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong chos skyong
